item.title: Gladinet’s Triofox and CentreStack Under Active Exploitation via Critical RCE Vulnerability
item.description:
A recently disclosed security flaw in Gladinet CentreStack also impacts its Triofox remote access and collaboration solution, according to Huntress, with seven different organizations compromised to date.

item.title: Meta Resumes E.U. AI Training Using Public User Data After Regulator Approval
item.description:

item.title: Crypto Developers Targeted by Python Malware Disguised as Coding Challenges
item.description:
